data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 13,439 believers in Sakha that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sakha, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Sakha, Russia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Sakha that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Sakha, Russia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Yakut people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Yakut people.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Sakha.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sakha to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Sakha, Russia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
